title: The NFL Show Live From Miami | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
We’re live at radio row in Miami to break down the most interesting matchups in the Super Bowl. We analyze how the 49ers will defend the Chiefs’ elite speed, and how the Chiefs will handle the 49ers' relentless run game. We talk Kyle Shanahan’s Belichickian coaching preparation, each team's X factor, prop bets, Miami as a Super Bowl host, and more.
Host: Kevin Clark
Guest: Danny Kelly and Rodger Sherman

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
